carts-delete.title: Delete confirmation
carts-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected Carts?

cart-save.title: Save changes
cart-save.message: The cart has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

Cart.AbandonedCart1stEvent.title: Abandoned cart: 1st user warn after (min)
Cart.AbandonedCart1stEvent.description: System will send 1st notification to user after that quantity of minutes

Cart.AbandonedCart2ndEvent.title: Abandoned cart: 2nd user warn after (min)
Cart.AbandonedCart2ndEvent.description: System will send 2nd notification to user after that quantity of minutes

Cart.AbandonedCartDrop.title: Abandoned cart: expire after (min)
Cart.AbandonedCartDrop.description: Cart will be completely deleted after this time in minutes
